content:
And so it's time to launch a new version of my personal website, https://barryfrost.com. Over the last few weeks I've been building this new platform from scratch with a few new key aims:

1. Hosting all of my 10+ years of Pinboard/Delicious bookmarks, Twitter tweets and blog articles
1. Sending replies, reposts and likes to IndieWeb sites and silos like Instagram
1. Store all my content in files rather than in a database but cache/index using SQL/NoSQL
1. Exposing a [Micropub](http://indiewebcamp.com/micropub) endpoint for creating new content
1. Displaying reply/repost/like contexts above posts
1. Bringing my software up-to-date with [IndieWeb](http://indiewebcamp.com) technologies
1. Learning how to set up my server/VPS from scratch, rather than relying on Heroku 

My last system #Baker offered a partial implementation of [webmentions](http://indiewebcamp.com/webmention) and syndications but was buggy and broken in places. My Microformats markup was also flaky. Hopefully this new attempt is a little more robust. Fuller details are in the [colophon](/colophon).

So kick the tyres, send this post a webmention from your site or respond on Twitter.
